### 1. 
```{r init_seed, echo = TRUE}
set.seed(1234)
``` 

### 2. 
```{r generate_data_norm, echo = TRUE}
n <- 100
x <- rnorm(n, 3, 1)
```

### 3.
```{r generate_y, echo = TRUE}
sigma2e <- c(0.1, 0.5, 2, 6)
b0 <- 1
b1 <- 2

y <- matrix(0, ncol = 4, nrow = n)
for (i in seq_len(ncol(y)))
y[, i] <- b0 + b1 * x + rnorm(n, 0, sqrt(sigma2e[i]))
```

### 4. 
```{r print_points}
par(mfrow = c(2, 2))
for (i in seq_len(4))
plot(x, y[, i], xlab = "x", ylab = "y", main = paste("sigma2e =", sigma2e[i]))
title("Nuages de points")
```

### 5.

```{r create_data_frames}
d1 <- data.frame(X = x, Y = y[, 1])
d2 <- data.frame(X = x, Y = y[, 2])
d3 <- data.frame(X = x, Y = y[, 3])
d4 <- data.frame(X = x, Y = y[, 4])

str(d1)
head(d1)

summary(d1)

plot(d1)

m1 <- lm(Y ~ X, data = d1)
summary(m1)
coef(m1)
```
